data.name: Tales of the Elements FC - Original Album
data.detailed_description:
Played the game? Now listen to the album!

Tales of the Elements FC is the full-length vocal album produced and recorded by Last BeNeVoLeNcE featuring guest vocals from Mega Ran, Kharisma, and K-Murdock.

If you own a copy of Tales of the Elements FC, you can download these 15 songs that tell the original musical story that the game is based on!

Tracklisting:

1. Prologue
2. Main Menu
3. The Protagonist
4. The False Beginning & The Random Hero (feat. Mega Ran)
5. Legends Of The Black Mic Part 1
6. Abilities (feat. Mega Ran)
7. Tales of the Elements (feat. Mega Ran)
8. Just So Hard (To Find Help)
9. A B-Boy's Tale (feat. Kharisma)
10. Snowberry
11. Seal Upon Your Heart
12. Safe For Some Time
13. Obstacle
14. Meanwhile (Search Party) feat. Mega Ran & Kharisma
15. Saving Point Part 2

All 15 tracks are in high-quality 320kbps mp3 format.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Any
  • Processor: Any
  • Graphics: N/A
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible
  • Additional Notes: This album is downloaded into the game folder which is found in the Steam Directory at: ...Steam\steamapps\common\Tales of the Elements
